sentence.Network_en: Perhaps the most unusual of these is the Minoan bull fighting.
sentence.Network_cn: 很可能最不寻常的就是克里特文明的斗牛.

sentence.Network_en: A colossal tsunami destroyed the minoan civilization in minutes.
sentence.Network_cn: 巨大的海啸在几分钟内就摧毁了米诺斯文明.

sentence.Network_en: The archaeologist dated the ruins as belonging to the early Minoan period.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位考古学家确定该废墟属于早期弥诺斯时期.

means.word_mean: 1. a Cretan who lived in the bronze-age culture of Crete about 3000-1100 BC

auth_sentence.content: Local attractions include the Minoan Palace at Knossos and the bars and shops of Heraklion, the island capital.
